data.decision: Cinematch component library uses dark theme with burgundy accent (#6B2D3C), Outfit for UI text, Cormorant Garamond for display, 8px border radius standard
data.rationale: Editorial Swiss aesthetic fits creative professional networking. Dark mode suits film/music industry users. Burgundy accent adds sophistication without competing. Dual-font system (serif display + geometric sans) creates editorial gravitas.
data.context: Phase 0 of Cinematch restructure experiment - design mockups in Pencil before implementation
